title: A sermon preached to the Parliament, Octob. 13. 1652. A day of solemne humiliation. Concerning the kingdome of Christ, and the power of the civile magistrate about the things of the worship of God.    / By John Owen.
author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.
publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield printer to the University, for Thomas Robinson,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
